artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of five elaborate women's hats and one woman's belt/sash hanging from a rope in the middle panel in white with pink and green vines, a yellow border and fringe, and two oval shapes with yellow trim around the borders at either end of the garment with a landscape scene and green trees in each oval
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Neuvième Cahier, 21 Février 1789
